data.sunServiceSchema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="MailServer" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="MailServer"  i18nKey="forgerock-email-service-description"  resourceName="email"  revisionNumber="1"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/ForgeRockSendEmailService" >

            <Organization hideConfigUI="no" >
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a100"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="forgerockMailServerImplClassName"  order="100"  resourceName="emailImplClassName"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>org.forgerock.openam.services.email.MailServerImpl</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a101"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="forgerockEmailServiceSMTPHostName"  order="200"  resourceName="hostname"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
                    <ExampleValue>
                        <Value>smtp.example.com</Value>
                    </ExampleValue>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a102"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="forgerockEmailServiceSMTPHostPort"  order="300"  rangeEnd="65535"  rangeStart="0"  resourceName="port"  syntax="number_range"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>465</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a103"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="forgerockEmailServiceSMTPUserName"  order="400"  resourceName="username"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
                    <ExampleValue>
                        <Value>username</Value>
                    </ExampleValue>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a104"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="forgerockEmailServiceSMTPUserPassword"  order="500"  resourceName="password"  syntax="password"  type="single" >
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a105"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="forgerockEmailServiceSMTPSSLEnabled"  order="600"  resourceName="sslState"  syntax="string"  type="single_choice" >
                    <ChoiceValues>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="ssl" >SSL</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="nonssl" >Non SSL</ChoiceValue>
                        <ChoiceValue i18nKey="starttls" >Start TLS</ChoiceValue>
                    </ChoiceValues>
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>SSL</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a106"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="forgerockEmailServiceSMTPFromAddress"  order="700"  resourceName="from"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
                    <ExampleValue>
                        <Value>no-reply@example.com</Value>
                    </ExampleValue>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a107"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="openamEmailAttribute"  order="800"  resourceName="emailAddressAttribute"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
                    <DefaultValues>
                        <Value>mail</Value>
                    </DefaultValues>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a108"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="forgerockEmailServiceSMTPSubject"  order="900"  resourceName="subject"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
                    <IsOptional></IsOptional>
                </AttributeSchema>
                <AttributeSchema cosQualifier="default"  hideConfigUI="no"  i18nKey="a109"  isSearchable="no"  listOrder="natural"  name="forgerockEmailServiceSMTPMessage"  order="1000"  resourceName="message"  syntax="string"  type="single" >
                    <IsOptional></IsOptional>
                </AttributeSchema>
            </Organization>
        </Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
